column4: hi, i have a running ubuntu (9.04) but it's a little screwed up (coming from kubuntu->xubuntu->ubuntu 8.04) and now i would like to format and reinstall 9.04 but i can't burn a cd neither my laptop has a floppy drive or can boot from usb... any suggestions?
but i have a windows xp besides
if you have the ISO try going system -> Administration -> usb startup disc
